description: Spearheaded the comprehensive development of a proprietary SaaS platform, tailored to client specifications.

Pioneered the development of a sophisticated in-house Form Builder utilizing Form.io, empowering users to effortlessly construct intricate forms for their online platforms while seamlessly managing form submissions.
Innovated the execution of an in-house Website Builder leveraging GrapesJS, facilitating streamlined website creation for users lacking coding expertise.
Engineered a bespoke customer support chat application and widget, optimizing user engagement, through the integration and consumption of Socket events.
Orchestrated the seamless implementation of React-Query, enhancing application performance through efficient data caching mechanisms.
Architected robust REST APIs utilizing Express.js and MongoDB to drive the operational backbone of an advanced E-Learning platform.
Executed cutting-edge authentication mechanisms via Firebase Auth, ensuring secure access and user authentication within the platform.
Spearheaded the development of the application's dynamic FrontEnd utilizing React.js, Redux, and Material-UI, resulting in an intuitive and visually captivating user interface.
Implemented Redux for comprehensive global state management, optimizing data flow and enhancing the scalability of the application architecture.
